thread.title: Kathleen Alvarez
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Kathleen Alvarez

author: Kathleen Alvarez
title: Kathleen Alvarez
text: Our sales person(Patrick) was very knowledgeable with the products we wanted to purchase. Free delivery and sales tax paid by company made this an even sweeter deal. Delivery was made easy by calls and emails on timing of delivery. Delivery men were very pleasant and did a great job setting up items.
